      • distance

        private int distance(Square a,
                     Square b,
                     int dist)
        Only for Private use. Calculate the minimum distance from A to B.
        Parameters:
        a - one square.
        b - one square.
        dist - recursive dist in this pass of algorithm.
        Returns:
        minimum distance between A and B

      • distance

        private int distance(int rInit,
                     int cInit,
                     int rDest,
                     int cDest,
                     int dist)
        Private recursive method, called by public method. Calculate the minimum distance from A(rInit,cInit) to B(rDest,cDest).
        Parameters:
        rInit - row of current square
        cInit - column of current square
        rDest - row of search square
        cDest - column of search square
        dist - recursive dist in this pass of algorithm
        Returns:
        minimum distance from A(rInit,cInit) to B(rDest,cDest)
